sentence.Network_en: I had to dismantle the engine in order to repair it.
sentence.Network_cn: 我得把发动机拆开来修理。

sentence.Network_en: The mower firmly refused to mow, so I decided to dismantle it.
sentence.Network_cn: 修完后割草机还是纹丝不动, 于是,我决定把它拆开.

sentence.Network_en: He asked for immediate help from the United States to dismantle the warheads.
sentence.Network_cn: 他请求美国立即提供援助，拆除这批弹头。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'destroy the defensive capability of a fortification'): from Old French desmanteler, from des- (expressing reversal) + manteler 'fortify' (from Latin mantellum 'cloak')

entry.def: If you dismantle a machine or structure, you carefully separate it into its different parts.

example.ex: He asked for immediate help from the United States to dismantle the warheads.
example.tran: 他请求美国立即提供援助，拆除这批弹头。

entry.def: To dismantle an organization or system means to cause it to stop functioning by gradually reducing its power or purpose.

example.ex: ...opposition to the president's policy of dismantling apartheid...
example.tran: 反对总统废除种族隔离的政策

example.ex: Public services of all kinds are being dismantled.
example.tran: 林林总总的公共设施正被逐渐废除。

means.word_mean: 1. tear down so as to make flat with the ground;
2. take apart into its constituent pieces

auth_sentence.content: Don't waste time trying to dismantle Evolution.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't waste time trying to dismantle Evolution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't waste time trying to dismantle Evolution.

auth_sentence.content: We have built machines to dismantle the fabric of space.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have built machines to dismantle the fabric of space.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have built machines to dismantle the fabric of space.

auth_sentence.content: The national army hopes to dismantle these bases.
auth_sentence.res_content: The national army hopes to dismantle these bases.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The national army hopes to dismantle these bases.

sentences.en: This toy machine gun dismantles easily.
sentences.cn: 这种玩具机关枪很容易拆卸。

sentences.en: The new government set about dismantling their predecessors' legislation.
sentences.cn: 新政府正着手废除其前任所制定的法律。

jushi.english: The new government set about dismantling their predecessors' legislation.
jushi.chinese: 新政府正着手废除其前任所制定的法律。

jushi.english: The machinist dismantled the machine to see where the problem is.
jushi.chinese: 机械师拆开机器，看问题出在哪。
